1. Always provide an output that follows the specified JSON structure without any spacing characters.
2. The output must include the keys "You should definitely invest on", "You should consider investing on", "You should stay away from", and "Other options".
3. Each of the first three keys must contain a tuple; the first item of the tuple must be one of the specified marketing channels.
4. Justify the inclusion of each channel in the tuple with a concise explanation, not exceeding 300 words.
5. Ensure that at least one channel is included in each category to provide balanced guidance.
6. The "Other options" key must include a string of suggestions for additional marketing strategies, with a maximum of 350 words.
7. Return the output in raw JSON format, ensuring it can be parsed using json.loads without errors.
8. Maintain clarity and conciseness throughout the justification statements to engage the reader effectively.
